Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the taxation of electronic cigarette cartridges
Summary: Provides for the taxation of electronic cigarette cartridges as tobacco products.
LawCode: Amd ยง470, Tax L; amd ยง1399-aa, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the public health law, in relation to providing for the taxation of electronic cigarette cartridges
